title: Cold Black-Eyed Peas and Corn
directions: Mix black-eyed peas, corn, pimento peppers, onion, garlic, Italian dressing, coriander, and cilantro in a large bowl until well combined.
ingredients: 1 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
1 (4 ounce) jar diced pimento peppers, drained
1 tablespoon bottled Italian dressing, or to taste
